functions.name: openUI
functions.description: Opens the address book user interface.

functions.name: closeUI
functions.description: Closes the address book user interface.

functions.name: list

parameters.name: complete
parameters.description: If set to true, results will include contacts and mailing lists for each address book.

functions.description: Gets a list of the user's address books, optionally including all contacts and mailing lists.

functions.name: get

parameters.name: complete
parameters.description: If set to true, results will include contacts and mailing lists for this address book.

functions.description: Gets a single address book, optionally including all contacts and mailing lists.

functions.name: create
functions.description: Creates a new, empty address book.

functions.name: delete
functions.description: Removes an address book, and all associated contacts and mailing lists.

events.name: onCreated
events.description: Fired when an address book is created.

events.name: onUpdated
events.description: Fired when an address book is renamed.

events.name: onDeleted
events.description: Fired when an addressBook is deleted.

NodeType.description: Indicates the type of a Node, which can be one of addressBook, contact, or mailingList.

AddressBookNode.description: A node representing an address book.

id.description: The unique identifier for the node. IDs are unique within the current profile, and they remain valid even after the program is restarted.

readOnly.description: Indicates if the object is read-only. Currently this returns false in all cases, as read-only address books are ignored by the API.

contacts.description: A list of contacts held by this node's address book or mailing list.

mailingLists.description: A list of mailingLists in this node's address book.
